function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Need for interdisciplinary collaboration in handling the crisis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of research on factors influencing ppe production, distribution, and usage","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deficiency in pandemic spark assessment and prior containment strategies","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Feasibility and cost issues in implementing strategic protocols","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Search databases may not cover all relevant articles related to contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or inaccurate search queries may result in irrelevant or biased results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited coverage of historical literature may result in incomplete understanding of pandemic trends and strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The spread of covid-19 in cities and countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for recurring public-health emergencies in modern cities and society","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global contagion of infectious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban marginalization and disease outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Response to contagious cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid urban population growth and high-rise density","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sprawling suburban development","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global interconnectedness of cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements devoid of governance, design, services, and legal status","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequalities in access to sanitation and homelessness","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing high-rise-dense cities during pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of emergency measures during crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk-literate urban citizenry leveraging crisis-information repositories for long-term impact","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proliferation of mutual aid groups and initiatives increases the risk of disease transmission within these groups.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate recognition of at-risk groups by local authorities increases the vulnerability of these populations to contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data, global connectivity challenges, and closing borders hinder effective disease monitoring and control by city governments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential overcrowding in public venues and transport","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and job precarity leading to challenges","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate city infrastructure and design for disease management","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent movement of people across the globe","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Antimicrobial resistance and bioterrorism threat","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limiting nosocomial spread of infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in infectious period and asymptomatic cases for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of social distancing measures to curb disease distancing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity on duration and extent of social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of community engagement in containment strategy","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scientific uncertainties about covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Travel contributing to disease of herd immunity as a strategy to reduce infection spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate public healthcare infrastructure in india to support herd immunity
